original_text: The true God made the earth and everything that is in it. He rules everything in the earth and in heaven. He does not live in any buildings that people have made for him.
korean_text: 우주와 그 가운데 있는 만물을 지으신 하나님께서는 천지의 주재시니 손으로 지은 전에 계시지 아니하시고

sentences.original_text: The true God made the earth
and everything that is in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 있는 모든 것을 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: in the earth and in heaven
He does not live in any buildings
that people have made for him
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그를 위해 만든 건물에 거주하지 않으십니다
